articles.title: More people now vaccinated against Covid-19 than infected worldwide, data shows - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: More people are now vaccinated against Covid-19 than have been infected by the virus that has swept the globe over the past year, a milestone on the road to ending the pandemic, based on data reported on Wednesday.
